- Moving DOWN to (7, 0) puts me on a path towards the apple at (9, 0). From (7, 0), I would likely move RIGHT twice (to (8, 0) then (9, 0)). This path takes 3 moves.

Moving LEFT is the fastest way to reach the closest apple. It is also a safe move, as (6, 1) is not occupied by my body, a wall, or the enemy snake.

Strategy for next turn: After moving LEFT to (6, 1), my head will be at (6, 1) and my body will be at [(7, 1), (7, 2), (7, 3)]. The target apple is at (6, 2). I will plan to move UP to (6, 2) to eat the apple, assuming the space remains clear.
